member.summary: TreeView control for an unspecified client's nearby avatar list

member.summary: Thread-safe method for clearing the TreeView control

member.name: T:OpenMetaverse.GUI.TrackedAvatar
member.summary: Contains any available information for an avatar in the simulator. A null value for .Avatar indicates coarse data for an avatar outside of visible range.

member.summary: Assigned if the avatar is within visible range

member.summary: Last known coarse location of avatar

member.summary: Avatar ID

member.summary: ListViewItem associated with this avatar

member.name: F:OpenMetaverse.GUI.TrackedAvatar.Name
member.summary: Populated by RequestAvatarName if avatar is not visible
